resources.string:
Letter Drag - A fun game about shuffling characters.

How to play:
Touch a character and drag it to its correct position.
Swipe up to get a new word.
Double tap to get options

This will reset all colors and the font!

In Letter Drag each word is scrambled. Your task is to unwind the words by dragging the characters to their correct positions.\n\nWhile playing, double tap to enter settings or get a new word if you are stuck.
The letters in this word are not in the right order. You can drag each letter to its correct position.
After you dragged the \"L\" into its correct position, the last \"o\" and \"g\" are wrong. Just change their position.
The word is now correct! A new word will appear.
